alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, or 17 miles west of Sunrise, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Weston, Parkland, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Loxahatchee NWR and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
